EmailTemplate.description: Notification after BX009 Status is set to 'BRB Approved' and PL needs to associate a Process ID. Mail should mention that PL should create a case in the Service Now. The mail should contain a link to Service Now
EmailTemplate.name: GMPL/ BX009: Project Lead to associate a Process ID
EmailTemplate.subject: BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' needs Process ID
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi, The BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' has been approved by BRB. Please associate the respective Process ID to the BX009 and also create a case in Service Now for the Finance Team to associate a PA Code to the BX009.
The BX009 can be accessed via {!GMPL_BX009__c.Link}. Service Now application can be accessed via http://servicenow.globalfoundries.com
Thanks
